item.title: Add user
item.description: create a user with home dir useradd -m testuser create a password for user passwd testuser modify user account usermod -aG sudo -s /bin/bash testuser it means append testuser to sudo Group, and bash used for this user.

item.title: Configure wifi on ubuntu
item.description: configure wifi information. ubuntu@ubuntu:~$ cat /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf netwokr={ ssid="cicso" psk="ubunut12345" } specify configure file and network interface. ubuntu@ubuntu:~$ cat /lib/systemd/system/wpa_supplicant.service ..... [Service] ExecStart=/sbin/wpa_supplicant -u -s -o /run/wpa_supplicant/ -c /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf -i wlan0 .....
